verbs.description: NEW YORK -- [ARG0: The U.N.] [V: says] [ARG1: Secretary - General Antonio Guterres is calling the summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un " an important milestone " in advancing peace and " complete and verifiable denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula . " U.N.]

NEW YORK -- The U.N. says Secretary - General Antonio Guterres [V: is] calling the summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un " an important milestone " in advancing peace and " complete and verifiable denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula . " U.N.

NEW YORK -- The U.N. says [ARG0: Secretary - General Antonio Guterres] is [V: calling] [ARG1: the summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARG2: " an important milestone " in advancing peace and " complete and verifiable denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula] . " U.N.

NEW YORK -- The U.N. says Secretary - General Antonio Guterres is calling the summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un " an important milestone " in [V: advancing] [ARG1: peace] and " complete and verifiable denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula . " U.N.
